text: dEqvAqsuqrAH saM~Mya#ttA Asaqn tAn dEqvAnasu#rA ajayaqn tE dEqvAH pa#rAjigyAqnA asu#rANAqM ~MvaiSyaqmupA#&&yaqn tEBya# indriqyaM ~MvIqrya#mapA$krAmaqt tadindrO#&cAyaqt tadanvapA$krAmaqt tada#vaqrudhaqM nASa#knOqt tada#smAdaByaqrddhO# &caraqth sa praqjApa#tiqmupA#dhAvaqt tamEqtayAq sarva#pRuShThayA&yAjayaqt tayaiqvAsmi#nnindriqyaM ~MvIqrya#madadhAqdya i#ndriqyakA#mO - [  ]  29
